document_data.name: Nasaqh Estates
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nasaqh Estates''' were a plot of land ruled by Lord [[Nasaqh]] and his ancestors. They lay between [[Mount Helimbrar]] and [[Mount Sar]], east of the [[High Road]] out of [[Waterdeep]] along the [[Sword Coast North]].{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep|2, 15}}
document_data.Trade: The Nasaqh Estates were best known for producing [[seawine]], a powerful liqueur popular in Waterdeep among wealthy merchants.
